segment.source: Application Virtualization Management Servers, also called application publishing servers, control access to the applications that are processed to run in a virtual environment.
segment.target: Application Virtualization Management Servers, also called application publishing servers, control access to the applications that are processed to run in a virtual environment.

segment.source: Virtual applications are stored on the Application Virtualization Management Servers.
segment.target: Virtual applications are stored on the Application Virtualization Management Servers.

segment.source: When a virtual application is called for by the client, the application package is streamed to the client from the Application Virtualization Management Servers.
segment.target: When a virtual application is called for by the client, the application package is streamed to the client from the Application Virtualization Management Servers.

segment.source: You can also stream applications to clients from Application Virtualization Streaming Servers.
segment.target: You can also stream applications to clients from Application Virtualization Streaming Servers.

segment.source: Streaming Servers do not offer some of the services that are available from the Management Servers, such as publishing, management, and reporting.
segment.target: Streaming Servers do not offer some of the services that are available from the Management Servers, such as publishing, management, and reporting.

segment.source: You can stream applications to the client directly from a file or disk.
segment.target: You can stream applications to the client directly from a file or disk.

segment.source: Some application virtualization deployment scenarios, which are characterized by low or unreliable connectivity or where bandwidth is limited, are ideally suited for streaming from file or disk.
segment.target: Some application virtualization deployment scenarios, which are characterized by low or unreliable connectivity or where bandwidth is limited, are ideally suited for streaming from file or disk.

segment.source: One or more Application Virtualization Management Servers that share a single data store make up an Application Virtualization system.
segment.target: One or more Application Virtualization Management Servers that share a single data store make up an Application Virtualization system.

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Overview
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Overview

segment.target: How to Refresh Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
